mapper.insert: insert into product( seller, name, contents, count, price, category, type ) values( #{seller}, #{name}, #{contents}, #{count}, #{price}, #{category}, #{type} )

select product_file_no, from productfile where product_no = #{ productNo } and flag = false
select , product_no, reg_date from product where seller = #{seller} and deleted = false

select seller, name, contents, d.count, d.price, category, view, d.type, p.product_no, d.reg_date from product p inner join deal d on p.product_no = d.product_no where buyer = #{buyer} and d.deleted = false
mapper.update: update product set count = count - 1 where product_no = #{productNo}
mapper.delete: delete from heart where id = #{id} and product_no = #{productNo}
mapper.select: select , h.product_no from product p, heart h where p.product_no = h.product_no and h.id = #{id} order by h.reg_date desc
select , p.product_no, h.id, count(h.product_no) from product p, heart h where p.product_no = h.product_no group by h.product_no order by count(h.product_no) desc limit 0,8
